tool_description:
Get Access to NBA Leagues & Cups with the latest scores, odds, bookmakers, statistics, standings and historical data that are updated after every game.

Bugs fixed...!
name: API-BASKETBALL (NBA)
title: API-BASKETBALL (NBA)

api_list.name: Get News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-basketball-nba.p.rapidapi.com/nba-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-basketball-nba.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Game Box Score
api_list.description:
Gets the NBA game box score data for a specified game.

Parameters_>
id - Game id

api_list.name: Game Summary
api_list.description: Gets the NBA game summary data for a specified game.

api_list.description: Gets the NBA game PickCenter data for a specified game.

api_list.name: NBA Teams Standings
api_list.description: Gets the team standings for the NBA.

api_list.name: NBA Team Info
api_list.description: Gets the team info for a specific NBA team.

api_list.name: Team Roster Information
api_list.description: Gets the team roster information for a especific NBA team.

api_list.name: NBA Scoreboard
api_list.description:
Gets the NBA scoreboard data for a specified date if available.

   /*
       Param	Type	Description
    year     	 *   	Year   (YYYY)
    mont         *   	Month (MM)
     day         *	    Day (DD)

    */

api_list.name: NBA Shedules
